modName: Summon Chaurus Reaper and Spriggan Matron
summary: This mod adds 2 spells which allow you to conjure a Charus Reaper and a Spriggan Matron.
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds 2 spells which allow you to conjure a Charus Reaper and a Spriggan Matron.
The books can be found at the Whiterun Catacombs if you walk down the left stairs. They are lying next to a skeleton.Â 

Stats:
The creatures are lvl 80
The spells last for 3 minutes
The spells require 50 magicka to cast
author: Replicant44
